tooltip.blockmod.transformer_block.toolt:
The §d§lTransformer Block§r  is a entity §oreality shifter§r,
replacing all contents dropped on top of it with its §c§lsuperior counterpart§r.
tooltip.blockmod.shiftchisel.tooltip:
The §dChisel§r is a automatic building tool, turning blocks clicked into its building block counterpart.
The §dChisel§r can cycle through building blocks.
tooltip.blockmod.hardwood_alloy.tooltip:
The pinnacle of wood, §dHardwood Alloys§r,
A late game item used for advanced crafting recipes and processes
